titles.title: To amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 respecting the participation in or attendance of operators at interviews conducted in connection with an investigation of an accident.

bill.summary: 3/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to prohibit a mine operator from participating in or attending any interview of an employee with respect to any accident investigation of the mine operation conducted by the Secretary of the Interior.
